servinfo.title: Brake and Parking Brake Warning Light Symptom Diagnosis

condition.ptxt: Brake warning light does not light up when brake fluid level is low or parking brake is pulled up or for 5 seconds after turning ON ignition switch (with ABS vehicle only)

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.

ps.ptxt: Data (information) can not be received by CAN communication

action.ptxt: Check BCM for DTC referring to DTC Check .
Check brake fluid level switch referring to Brake Fluid Level Switch Inspection .
Check parking brake switch referring to Parking Brake Switch Inspection .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

ps.ptxt: Data (information) can not be received by CAN communication

action.ptxt: Check BCM for DTC referring to DTC Check .
Check brake fluid level switch referring to Brake Fluid Level Switch Inspection .
Check parking brake switch referring to Parking Brake Switch Inspection .
Refer to EBD Warning Lamp (Brake Warning Lamp) Check .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
